channel.title: Crash when trying to play
channel.description:
What happened: Game crashes when I try to enter a match.
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Game should not crash.
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Open the game and join a game 2. Crash! 3. Crash dump https://drive.google.com/open?id=1nmXkdozE0eRzWPnDadYJJizPXWvkaxt6 Output_log https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Dvs9qyW88YtCOUa1CEQGc1L3Kc1z6uoB Error file https://drive.google.com/open?id=1BFttroAVKLjO5CeZXY0-NhGONg-kZgyR

item.title: Crash when trying to play
item.dc:creator: Kaerum
item.description:
What happened:
Game crashes when I try to enter a match.

What was SUPPOSED to happen:
Game should not crash.

Steps to reproduce this issue:

  1. Open the game and join a game
  2. Crash!

Crash dump
